title.narrative: OUTPUT 4.3B: EVERY CHILD LIVES IN A SAFE AND CLEAN ENVIRONMENT (RR)

description.narrative: Output 4.3b. Every child lives in a safe environment. Regional, national stakeholders, and COs have up-to-date evidence and increased capacity to develop, monitor and implement timely and effective multi-sectorial, humanitarian action., which contributes to Disaster Risk Reduction. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

title.narrative: Output 4.3b. Every child lives in a safe environment. Regional, national stakeholders, and COs have up-to-date evidence andincreased capacity to develop, monitor and implement timely and effective multi-sectorial, humanitarian action.

description.narrative: Latin America & Caribbean Regional Office Emergency Unit (EU) provided technical assistance, direct support, and guidance to COs in LAC to increase their capacity to prepare, develop, monitor, and implement timely and effective multi-sectorial humanitarian action in Bolivia, Brazil, Colombia, Ecuador, Guyana, Peru, Venezuela and Trinidad & Tobago.;; ; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:02/03/2022
